title: Bell
summaries: The Bell is a Hardmode crafting material purchased from the Wizard for 1. It is used to the craft the Fairy Bell, a light pet-summoning item.
When used, the Bell creates a sound that changes in pitch depending on the distance between the player and the point clicked.
